description: I’ve been using my resources at The Armory to find a personal slave for my home. Marcus Ruhl’s slave resume came across my desk by way of a mistress that I know from Twitter. Apparently, Marcus impressed her in a content shoot they were doing. You see, one of my requirements for a personal slave is that you must be easy on the eyes and have a built body. This is because I require sexual worship on a daily basis and I want to be turned on! Marcus fit this description so I thought I would give him a shot in front of the camera before I took him home with me. Watch before your eyes Marcus fail miserably and the search for a personal home slave continues!
title: Maitresse Madeline searches for a personal slave for her home.
